description: Collection items that can be displayed in various layouts

props.name: columns
props.description: Optional column settings for the table layout

props.name: fields
props.description: Optional fields configuration that is used for table layout

props.name: items
props.description: Array of item definitions. See `k-item` for available options.

props.name: link
props.description: Enable/disable that each item is a clickable link

props.name: selecting
props.description: Whether items are in selecting mode

props.name: sortable
props.description:
Whether items are generally sortable.
Each item can disable this individually.

props.name: image
props.description: Globale image/icon settings. Will be merged with the image settings of each item. See `k-item-image` for available options.
